channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside Google’s AI leap: Gemini 2.5 thinks deeper, speaks smarter and codes faster
item.description: Google is moving closer to its goal of autonomous agentic AI with a series of enhancements to Gemini 2.5 Pro and Flash.

item.title: Google just leapfrogged every competitor with mind-blowing AI that can think deeper, shop smarter, and create videos with dialogue
item.description: Google unveiled major AI advancements at I/O 2025, including Gemini 2.5 with Deep Think, AI Mode in Search, Veo 3 for video with audio, and a $249 Ult...

item.title: My wife, 66, has a pension, but never paid into Social Security. Does new legislation mean she’ll now receive benefits?
item.description: “I wasn’t planning on starting my benefits until age 67, but that will put her at 76.”

item.title: Brokers accused of steering seniors into a Medicare Advantage ‘trap’
item.description: Concerns are being raised that many seniors have been sold the insurance plans against their interests.

item.title: Trump’s $1.6 trillion claim: What the numbers really say about GOP tax bill
item.description: The White House’s claim that the GOP tax bill would save $1.6 trillion is only a partial accounting of the bill’s spending cuts — and ignores somethin...

item.title: Orbit 5.0 adds features to Boston Dynamics’ Spot quadruped robot
item.description: Boston Dynamics has added capabilities for scalable fleet management and insights from inspection data to Orbit 5.0 for Spot. The post Orbit 5.0 adds ...

item.title: Google’s Jules aims to out-code Codex in battle for the AI developer stack
item.description: Google released Jules, its coding agent, into beta as autonomous coding agents are quickly gaining market share.

item.title: The data center boom in the desert

item.title: ‘We’re not wealthy’: My niece is marrying out of state and she has a honeymoon fund. Is that cheeky?
item.description: “We are making plans to attend just to show support. The invitation states that our presence is a gift in itself.”

item.title: Victoria’s Secret moves to block activist investor from amassing controlling stake

item.title: We did the math on AI’s energy footprint. Here’s the story you haven’t heard.

item.title: Is your AI app pissing off users or going off-script? Raindrop emerges with AI-native observability platform to monitor performance
item.description: With its rebrand and product expansion, Raindrop is betting that the next generation of software observability will be AI-first by design.
